forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 36F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Rain may be heavy late. High near 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Rain becoming heavy at times in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 45F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 35F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low near 30F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low around 25F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 35F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Low 24F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intermittent light snow or snow showers becoming steadier late at night. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Intermittent light snow or snow showers becoming steadier late at night. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
